data.title: Meteorological Satellite Center (MSC)
data.text:
Meteorological Satellite Center Technical Note

To promote research and development for meteorological satellite data utilization and application, the Meteorological Satellite Center (MSC) issues the Meteorological Satellite Center Technical Note.

This contains articles, reports and notes including the results of research and development related to meteorological satellites.
